ActiveMQComponentBuilderFactory.title: ActiveMQ
ActiveMQComponentBuilderFactory.description: The activemq component allows messages to be sent to (or consumed from) Apache ActiveMQ. This component extends the Camel JMS component.
ActiveMQComponentBuilderFactory.label: messaging

DebeziumMySqlComponentBuilderFactory.title: Debezium MySQL Connector
DebeziumMySqlComponentBuilderFactory.description: Represents a Debezium MySQL endpoint which is used to capture changes in MySQL database so that that applications can see those changes and respond to them.
DebeziumMySqlComponentBuilderFactory.label: database,sql,mysql

KafkaComponentBuilderFactory.title: Kafka
KafkaComponentBuilderFactory.description: The kafka component allows messages to be sent to (or consumed from) Apache Kafka brokers.
KafkaComponentBuilderFactory.label: messaging

SalesforceComponentBuilderFactory.title: Salesforce
SalesforceComponentBuilderFactory.description: The salesforce component is used for integrating Camel with the massive Salesforce API.
SalesforceComponentBuilderFactory.label: api,cloud,crm
